paper_abstract: A less conservative stability analysis condition for closed-loop delayed linear systems subjected to uncertain, bounded, non-differentiable, additive time delays is presented. The obtained stability condition is applied to the problem of networked control system robust design in the presence of network-induced delays and data packet dropouts. Illustrative examples are provided to show the advantage and applicability of the developed results in this case.
paper_title: Improved synthesis method for network-based control
